name: Wizard of Truth in a Dungeon but the Game is a Lie (Liar liar pants on fire) (CrexCrex)
name_original: Wizard of Truth in a Dungeon but the Game is a Lie (Liar liar pants on fire) (CrexCrex)
description:
This game was made in under a week! So the pressure was high!

In this game you play as a Wizard of Truth. You are sent to a Dungeon of Quiz, where you will be examined in different knowledge levels. But is it an actual quiz? Or is it all a lie? Who is the mastermind behind all this? Can it be your nemesis: Wizard of Lies?

Fight your way through the dungeon full of Flies, Sliemes and other undiscovered lies!
